title: New: Blackbird Blackbird – Waikiki
content:
Ahead of his forthcoming EU tour, sunwave wonderkid Mikey Maramag has dropped a new track in the form of the wonderfully tropical Waikiki.

Embodying everything that’s great about Blackbird Blackbird, from the vibrant synths to wistful vocals, it may just be his finest work to date. Check out Waikiki below and grab a free download.
